Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The property is located in the central submarket just minutes from Downtown Las Vegas, the Las Vegas Strip, the Las Vegas Art District & the Las Vegas Medical District. The central location of the property provides great connectivity to the entire Las Vegas Valley with easy access to the I-15 and US-95 freeways.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 1900 Western Ave. is a ±14,000 SF office/flex building and features ±11,560 SF of office, ±2,440 SF warehouse, security system with cameras and key fob access, covered parking, a parking ratio of 3.1/1,000 SF and is zoned M (Industrial District).

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Northport Business Center is an optimal mix of office, flex, and industrial buildings totaling approximately ±126,000 square feet. Northport Business Center is located in North Las Vegas, along the Cheyenne Technology Corridor, adjacent to the North Las Vegas Airport.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 6700 Paradise Rd. is located within Hughes Airport Center, the premier business park in Las Vegas with 3.3 million sq. ft. of office and industrial space in close proximity to the Las Vegas Strip, McCarran International Airport, Town Square and numerous other amenities surrounding the area.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Unit 4489 is a ±2,727 SF flex unit with ±1,107 SF office, ±1,620 SF Warehouse, Four (4) Offices, Reception, One (1) Restroom, One (1) Grade-Level Roll-Up Door, and ±15’ Clear Height. CAMs: $0.255/SF. Available 10/1/2021.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Pace Commerce Center is well-situated just east of the Tropicana corridor and the Orleans Casino. Frontage units provide high visibility on the heavily traveled Arville Street.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Pace Commerce Center is a ±61,169 SF Industrial Project on ±3.35 acres, perfect location for business that service The Strip or the South West residential market. Features include grade level loading, flexible floor plans with small suites, shared dock access and high parking ratio. The ownership is pleasant to work with and eager to lease space.
